# unboltDoor(with:completion:)

**Instance Method**

Command UnboltDoor

## Declaration

```swift
func unboltDoor(with params: MTRDoorLockClusterUnboltDoorParams?) async throws
```

## Discussion

This command causes the lock device to unlock the door without pulling the latch.
